prompt: What is the current temperature in Berlin?

result.response: The current temperature in Berlin is 68°F (20°C). It feels like 68°F. There are passing clouds and the wind is from the Southwest at 8 mph {^1}.

web_sources.title: Weather Forecast and Conditions for Berlin, Germany | Weather.com
web_sources.text:
## Night

Scattered thunderstorms this evening followed by a few showers overnight. Low 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

## Sat 02

## Day

Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 73F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

## Night

Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

## Sun 03

## Day

Cloudy. High 68F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

## Night [...] Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

## Mon 04

## Day

Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 72F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

## Night

Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
